analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalizeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/45/0x656dfda5eb02047b3f4ddbb91777738a9d49eb99.sol):
	External calls:
	- _toVest = controller.balanceOf(CROWDSALE_WALLET) (/unique_chucks/45/0x656dfda5eb02047b3f4ddbb91777738a9d49eb99.sol)
	- controller.transferWithEvent(CROWDSALE_WALLET,LIFE_CHANGE_VESTING_WALLET,_toVest) (/unique_chucks/45/0x656dfda5eb02047b3f4ddbb91777738a9d49eb99.sol)
	- controller.startVesting(_toVest,1545264000) (/unique_chucks/45/0x656dfda5eb02047b3f4ddbb91777738a9d49eb99.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleFinalized (/unique_chucks/45/0x656dfda5eb02047b3f4ddbb91777738a9d49eb99.sol)

Reentrancy in Controller.init (/unique_chucks/45/0x656dfda5eb02047b3f4ddbb91777738a9d49eb99.sol#246-258):
	External calls:

	- mintWithEvent(CROWDSALE_WALLET,900 * (10 ** (6 + DECIMALS))) (/unique_chucks/45/0x656dfda5eb02047b3f4ddbb91777738a9d49eb99.sol#250-254)
